basics.name: Qi Yang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am currently a doctoral student at Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Sciences, under the guidance of Prof. Shiming Xiang. I received my bachelor's degree from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China under the supervision of Prof. Lu Yang. My research interests include computer vision, multi-modality, and AIGC. More details in pdf file.

education.institution: University of Electronic Science and Technology of China
Institute of Automation Chinese Academy of Sciences
